reviews.review_msg: (For MDSA02 at UTSC) Prof Narine is a great lecturer! Also approachable outside of class and respond to emails quickly. The lectures for the course are fun to watch with all the clips added which makes concepts much easier to understand. Weekly readings can be kinda long tho.

Very informative interesting lectures. Very nice and polite professor outside of class when I explained my corona situation. Responds to emails fairly quick. Course material was interesting. Lectures not mandatory but helped more with the final exam as it was a cumulative exam.
